references.reason: This foundational paper on GANs underpins many VTON approaches, shaping the core architecture and methodology of various virtual try-on models.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This work introduces a powerful approach to learn visual representations from text, significantly improving the quality and realism of generated images in VTON applications.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces a highly influential diffusion model for image generation, which is crucial for achieving high-fidelity and photorealistic results in virtual try-on.

references.paper_title: VITON-HD: High-resolution virtual try-on via misalignment-aware normalization
references.reason: This paper presents a high-resolution virtual try-on method, setting a new benchmark for image quality and providing a strong baseline for comparison in subsequent work.

references.paper_title: VITON: An image-based virtual try-on network
references.reason: This seminal paper introduces the initial concept of image-based virtual try-on, laying the groundwork for many subsequent advancements in this field.
